item.title: Three sprites three walls

Okay, that’s your goal. make and keep production goals keep it simple omg According to the third video, the type of game we are making is the 4th (of 9?)th most difficult type of game to make. Ah well screwit let’s just see what happens.

item.title: draggable pieces
item.description: 18:03 Tuesday 07 April 2015 JST Okay I’ve actually followed the toot a bit, but I know where I’m branching off. I think the key is with the Pixels Per Unit. In the tutorial, each gem is exactly one game unit wide,… that explains why they simply cannot exist in between the grid positions. This in-between existence is critical for our game, so that’s what I gotta figure out next.

item.title: Hello Unity
item.description: ##16:23 Monday 23 March 2015 JST## I evaluated Unreal Engine now that it’s free and its pricing model is quite nice! They require no payment until we start making money consistently. However, the dearth of assets and such impels me to stay with [Unity3D](). right now I’m doing this little pong tutorial which is geared toward Unity3D version 5.
